channel.title: How do i
channel.description:
i need to know how to make an NPC have a certain shop-
problem: i spawned an NPC and made the shop, but how do i connect the NPC with that shop so when you click trade it opens that shop?
solution: not sure.. thats what my question is..
[size=30pt]PLEASE HELP ME!! @THANKS@[/size]

item.title: How do i
item.dc:creator: @wicked_pker wicked pker
item.description:
@wicked_pker wrote:

add it to cleint.java
add it to autospawn

in shops cfg create new add shop and it have like shop = 13 at beginning take that number to cleint.java as wanneshop blah il add code

open shops.cfg add your shop

shop = 11	@red@Cooking_Store		1	1	349	1000	359	1000	371	1000	377	1000	383	1000	389	1000

then
go to cleint.java

search for } else if (NPCID ==

then add your shop

} else if (NPCID == 553) { //cooking shop PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 11; //cooking shop

the wanneshop means the shop no in shops.cfg

then go to autospawn.cfg and add him

spawn = 553	2340	3157	0	3480	9490	3890	9500	2	Cooking_Shop

Read full topic
